question:
Which among the following statements is/are correct about the Temperate Deciduous Biome?
  1. Precipitation in this biome happens year round.
  2. Bamboo, Sal, Shisham, Sandalwood, Khair, Kusum, Mulberry are commercially important species.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation: Temperate Deciduous Forests can be found in the eastern part of the United States and Canada, most of Europe and parts of China and Japan. Temperate deciduous forests get between 30 and 60 inches of precipitation a year. Precipitation in this biome happens year round. Three main types of trees are characteristic of these forests: northern hardwood, central hardwood, and southeast pine and oak.
